sentences.en: Don't jumble the innocent and the guilty.
sentences.cn: 不要混淆无辜的人和有罪的人.

sentences.en: Even the furniture remained the same jumble that it had always been.
sentences.cn: 甚至家具还是象过去一样杂乱无章.

sentences.en: Have those things for the jumble sale been looked out yet ?
sentences.cn: 作旧杂货拍卖的那些东西已找出来了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Have you any unwanted articles for the jumble sale?
sentences.cn: 你可有用不着的东西拿去当旧杂货拍卖 吗 ?

sentences.en: I must look out some bits and pieces for the church jumble sale.
sentences.cn: 我得找些零碎东西捐给教堂作义卖.

sentences.en: I turned and stared again at the jumble.
sentences.cn: 我转过身来,重新盯着那堆乱七八糟的东西.

sentences.en: It was a jumble without taste or truth.
sentences.cn: 那是一种缺乏鉴赏力和真实性的胡诌.

sentences.en: Make sure you don't jumble everything up.
sentences.cn: 一定不要把东西全都弄乱了.

sentences.en: Reminiscent of experimental film or abstract expressionist paintings, the software creates an animated jumble of bright and energetic abstract light compositions.
sentences.cn: 实验电影或抽象表现主义绘画让人回想起该软件创建了一个明亮的光线和有力的抽象作品动画混杂。

sentences.en: She expects me to drive round collecting jumble for the church.
sentences.cn: 她期望我能开车去四处收集旧物用于教堂义卖。

sentences.en: The manager floundered among a jumble of thoughts.
The photographs were all jumbled up.
sentences.cn: 照片乱七八糟地堆在一起。

sentences.en: The rest of the half - year is a jumble in my recollection.
sentences.cn: 这半年里,其余的日子,在我的日子里,只是一片混乱.

sentences.en: The shoreline was made up of a jumble of huge boulders.
sentences.cn: 海岸线上堆着一大堆杂乱的巨石。

sentences.en: The things on the table were all in a jumble.
This might be compared with the jumble of wavelengths of sound that go to make up ordinary noise.
sentences.cn: 这种现象可以与合在一起构成普通噪音的声波波长的混杂情况相比。

sentences.en: We are having a jumble sale at our school.
sentences.cn: 我们准备在学校里搞个旧物义卖。

sentences.en: Your old clothes will be gratefully accepted by jumble sale organisers.
sentences.cn: 旧货义卖的组织者会感激地领受您捐赠的旧衣物。

words.tran_cn: 轮状的薄糖果；薄脆小甜饼（等于jumble）

trans.tran_cn: 杂乱的一堆，一团乱，<英>待义卖的杂旧物
trans.tran_en: a lot of different things mixed together in an untidy way, without any order
to mix things together in an untidy way, without any order
a lot of different things mixed together in an untidy way, without any order
to mix things together in an untidy way, without any order
